data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 21,774 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Santa Cruz, Argentina
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Santa Cruz, Argentina that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.section_summary: On average, 14 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Santa Cruz, Argentina.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Santa Cruz.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Santa Cruz to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Turk people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Santa Cruz who will make disciples who make disciples.
Jesus, defend your people in the state of Santa Cruz against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Santa Cruz that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.
